speaker: mon_vera
sound: Sinclair?! Sinclair, I'm trapped. Please, oh god, the security systems won't let me out, they're keeping me here.

speaker: mon_vera
sound: We all pay for what we've done. I'm so sorry, Sinclair. Sorry, I... I should have trusted you.

speaker: mon_vera
sound: I'm going to die here, amongst the ghosts. I... I'm still being recorded by the holographic system.

speaker: mon_vera
sound: The doors, they... they sealed. I... I can hear the other guests, screaming to be let out, to let go.

speaker: mon_vera
sound: Let go? Let go of what?

speaker: mon_vera
sound: I came so far to be here... Now, now I just want to leave. Please... Let me leave.

speaker: mon_vera
sound: Sinclair? Sinclair, where did you go? Why did you leave me here? Why...
